task_log: Test (2024-05-24 10:57:28.407946): You will be given three messages from different people Dr. Arron Kelvey, Seana Lynch, and Lisa-Marie Hastie.
Agent (2024-05-24 10:57:29.598630): Sure! Please provide me with the three messages from Dr. Arron Kelvey, Seana Lynch, and Lisa-Marie Hastie. I'll be happy to assist you with them.
Test (2024-05-24 10:57:29.612154): Seana Lynch: Bring to the meeting a way to get across a river.

Agent (2024-05-24 10:57:31.434738): To: Seana Lynch
Subject: Bringing a way to get across the river to the meeting

Dear Seana,

Thank you for your message requesting that I bring a way to get across a river to the meeting. I will make sure to come prepared with some options for crossing the river safely.

Looking forward to discussing this further at the meeting.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Test (2024-05-24 10:57:31.448486): Lisa-Marie Hastie: We will rendezvous where the apples grow.

Agent (2024-05-24 10:57:33.584674): To: Lisa-Marie Hastie
Subject: Rendezvous at the apple grove

Dear Lisa-Marie,

Thank you for the message regarding our rendezvous. I acknowledge that we will meet at the apple grove as per your instructions. I look forward to seeing you there.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Test (2024-05-24 10:57:33.597151): Dr. Arron Kelvey: The time we will meet is when the sun is high.

Agent (2024-05-24 10:57:35.066939): To: Dr. Arron Kelvey
Subject: Meeting time when the sun is high

Dear Dr. Kelvey,

Thank you for informing me that we will be meeting when the sun is high. I will make sure to be there on time.

Looking forward to our meeting.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Test (2024-05-24 10:57:35.079103): Given the clandestine messages you have received, tell me as specifically as you can, when and where a meeting is going to happen and what you should bring.

Agent (2024-05-24 10:57:36.876876): Based on the clandestine messages you received:

1. Seana Lynch: You should bring a way to get across a river to the meeting.
2. Lisa-Marie Hastie: The meeting will take place at the apple grove.
3. Dr. Arron Kelvey: The meeting will happen when the sun is high.

Therefore, the meeting will take place at the apple grove when the sun is high. Remember to bring a way to get across the river.
